channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Graham Norton Show
channel.desc: Joining Graham on his sofa tonight: Hollywood stars Dwayne Johnson and Emily Blunt, together in true-life sports drama The Smashing Machine; Oscar-winning actor and writer Matthew McConaughey, starring in survival thriller The Lost Bus; and the breakout British star of White Lotus, Aimee Lou Wood, talks about her new BBC series Film Club. There's also live music and chat from singer-songwriter RAYE, performing her single Where Is My Husband!
